gdpr.description: Not in a country that enforces the EU's GDPR privacy regulations

tracking.description: Tracks users or running targetted ads

warranty.description: Sells hardware with less than 2 years of warranty

developer.description: Provides developer tooling and documentation for free

data.description: Suffered from a data leak due to improper security

monopoly.description: Holds a monopoly or near-monopoly in its industry

greenwashing.description: Uses greenwashing (fake environmental friendlyness) as a marketing strategy

lifetime.description: Sells hardware products with less than 5 years of life time
